name: Tactical Poker
description:
Challenge yourself in this unique variation of the classical five-card draw Poker game, where a normal deck of 52 cards is played consecutively in 5 rounds of poker hands, you can see which cards have been played after each round, helping you to figure out the odds for the next cards to come and which possible wining hand can be made. Additionally you can recover a few of the played cards, or discard some the cards to come to increase your chances of winning. How far can you win and how much can you score ?.. A perfect game for poker and solitaire lovers!

Features:
- Easy and fun game to play.
- Cool Graphics.
- Pleasant Music and Sound effects.
- 3 Difficulty settings.
- Fullscreen support.
- Close the game any time and resume later.

More games and info at www.boviosoft.com
